title: Skarner E was still nerfed even when Repetoir reverted it?
body:
E - Fracture
Slow Duration 2.0 >>> 2.5 (Live values)
Mana Cost 50/55/60/65/70 >>> 55 all ranks

However in the patch notes it says that it was nerfed to 2.0.
Is this just a typo?

replies.body: This is a failure to update the patch notes as well. Duration in the 5.16 patch will still be 2.5 seconds.
Man, this is one seriously f-ed up set of patch notes. Haven't seem so many innacuracies in quite a while.
what happens when one designer goes out of his way to help the community but forgets to update the sheet that the patch notes are written on.
Only one way to find out bro.
